title: Robert O. Davis
text:
Robert O. Davis (July 15, 1910 – July 1, 1992) was a <a href="Republican%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Republican</a> member of the <a href="Pennsylvania%20House%20of%20Representatives">Pennsylvania House of Representatives</a>. 
Life.
Born in <a href="New%20Castle%2C%20Pennsylvania">New Castle, Pennsylvania</a> on July 15, 1910, Davis attended <a href="Pennsylvania%20State%20University">Pennsylvania State University</a>, where he was a member of <a href="Sigma%20Pi">Sigma Pi</a> fraternity.
He died in <a href="Beaver%2C%20Pennsylvania">Beaver, Pennsylvania</a> on July 1, 1992.
